help.name: Help
help.description: Show all the bot command in this channel.

rank.name: Rank
rank.description: Change/Add rank and location by writing '!rank <desired rank> <desired location>'.

removeRank.name: Remove rank
removeRank.description: Remove the rank you are asign.

location.name: Location
location.description: Change/Add only the location by writing '!location <desired location>'.

removeLocation.name: Remove location
removeLocation.description: Remove the location you are asign.

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: Pin a massage to the channel. !pin <desired message>
